quotes.message: Whatever it is your heart desires, please go for it, it's yours to have.
quotes.name: Gloria Estefan

quotes.message: We're renting the space that we call Earth, so we may as well just go for it.
quotes.name: Masiela Lusha

quotes.message: Be confident in yourself, in your abilities, and in your goals. Then go for it.
quotes.name: Sharon Gannon

quotes.message: You only regret what you don't do! Go for it, live your dreams and enjoy it all!
quotes.name: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.message: A second ago is gone, and a second from now might be. Now is all you've got.
quotes.name: Lyn St. James

quotes.message: Don't be afraid to do the most insane thing. Don't think it's too crazy. Just go for it.
quotes.name: Mikey Way

quotes.message: If you're around someone who makes you feel good, you have to go for it. Don't hold back.
quotes.name: Faith Sullivan

quotes.message: The purpose of education is to create a purpose for life. Go for it with the utmost sincerity.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quotes.message: Once you are prepared and you think you have every angle of preparation covered, you have to go for it.
quotes.name: Mark Cuban

quotes.message: If you can find something you love, go for it everyday of your life, and it would be really good to you.
quotes.name: Jenifer Lewis

quotes.message: Your future shines bright - find your purpose and go for it. Starting tomorrow, you can change the world.
quotes.name: Gabrielle Giffords

quotes.message: A, surround yourself by positive people who will help you reach your goal and support you.
quotes.name: Zendaya

quotes.message: Risk it; go for it. Life always gives you another chance, another go at it. It's very important to take enormous risks.
quotes.name: Mary Quant

quotes.message: When you feel that you can't fight it, you just go for it. When it comes to the arts, passion should always trump common sense.
quotes.name: Robert De Niro

quotes.message: When chasing a dream, make sure the price is truly worth paying - if it is, go for it, if not, tweak your dream a little and then go for it.
quotes.name: John Avery

quotes.message: You have to focus on what's important to you and go for it. But don't stab people in the back. It poisons your whole life if you're like that.
quotes.name: Martha Stewart

quotes.message: No matter how long the preparation, you will never feel ready to write an exam, to start a business, to be parent or even to die. Just go for it.
quotes.name: Moffat Machingura

quotes.message: When good enough gets the job done, go for it. It's way better than wasting resources or, even worse, doing nothing because you can't afford the complex solution.
quotes.name: Jason Fried

quotes.message: You have to dream big and go for it. Surround yourself with people who believe in you and ignore those who try to bring you down.
quotes.name: Shannon MacMillan

quotes.message: If you're passionate about what you do, then go for it wholeheartedly. Be prepared that if anytime, you may be surprised by a phenomenal opportunity that may come your way, and that's when I say, do your homework. Be ready.
quotes.name: Julie Andrews

quotes.message: If you like something, go for it.
quotes.name: Elie Tahari

quotes.message: Dream! Dream! And then go for it!
quotes.name: Desmond Tutu

quotes.message: Believe in yourself and go for it.
quotes.name: Emma Watson

quotes.message: If something excites you, go for it.
quotes.name: Chad Hurley

quotes.message: Good things happen when you go for it!
quotes.name: Alan Webb

quotes.message: What you want is within reach. Go for it.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Get out, realize your dream, and go for it.
quotes.name: Kai Greene

quotes.message: Never give up. You only get one life.
quotes.name: Richard E. Grant

quotes.message: Dreams can come true, but you have to go for it.
quotes.name: Johan Santana

quotes.message: To satisfy a want or a need, you must first go for it
quotes.name: Martin Powell

quotes.message: You just go for it and see what works. There are no rules.
quotes.name: Joey McIntyre

quotes.message: When you find what you want in life, you just gotta go for it.
quotes.name: Chris Coppernoll

quotes.message: If you want to do something, go for it -you've got nothing to lose.
quotes.name: Louis Tomlinson

quotes.message: You're the only one who can make the difference. Whatever your dream is, go for it.
quotes.name: Earvin Magic Johnson

quotes.message: You should have a dream and absolutely go for it. Don't let anybody say you can't do it.
quotes.name: Christopher Reeve

quotes.message: Anything that you think is wild or fun, or can't wait to see or show your friends, go for it.
quotes.name: Roman Coppola

quotes.message: Never doubt yourself. Never change who you are. Don't care what people think and just go for it.
quotes.name: Britney Spears

quotes.message: Unleash your life's potential! Don't hold back on the things you've always wanted to do.
quotes.name: Denise Austin

quotes.message: Just keep being true to yourself, if you're passionate about something go for it. Don't sacrifice anything, just have fun.
quotes.name: Blake Lewis

quotes.message: Don't listen to anybody who's trying to bring you down. There's so much negativity in the world. If you really want something, then you go for it.
quotes.name: Ryan Cabrera

quotes.message: If you are talented, you can really do anything. And if your heart is at the right place and you have the passion for it, you can go for it and do it.
quotes.name: Heidi Klum
